pkgmetadata.longdescription: Liblinphone is a high-level SIP library integrating all calling and instant messaging features into an unified easy-to-use API. It is the cross-platform VoIP library on which the net-voip/linphone-desktop application is based on, and that anyone can use to add audio and video calls or instant messaging capabilities to an application.

use.flag: Support for BroadVoice 16 kbs codec via media-libs/bv16-floatingpoint
Support for SpanDSP codec via media-libs/spandsp
Support for ITU G729 Annex A/B speech codec via media-libs/bcg729
Support for network packet capture via net-libs/libpcap
Support for QR code via media-libs/zxing-cpp
Support for Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (SRTP) via net-libs/libsrtp
Support for VPX codec via media-libs/libvpx
Support for Media Path Key Agreement for Unicast Secure RTP via net-libs/bzrtp
